fakeNews.content: Avocadoes from a specific mexican region make hair turn blue
Swiss 1000CHF banknotes will be distributed by the governement to all who come in front of the Federal Palace in Bern
Jessica, the famous filmmaker, declared she now hates ukulele since the unexpected success of her short film about digital humanities
Dream jobs promised by Donald Trump for all who show themselves every first Mondays of each month in front of the White House
In the small village of la Brévine, a dog was seen giving finds to people complaining about the cold weather
According to a very serious study published by the University of Stanford, people with big feet and long noses don't get along with their partner's elephant
According an investigation from the New York Lost, Fake news do NOT constitute a big danger for democracies
The total weight of all châteaux de la Loire is equivalent to the yearly average wine consumption of swiss residents
The cheese Vacherin fribourgeois has calming properties, especially when melted in a Fondue
According to Tinkerbell, Peter Pan's existence has been proven
After years of waiting, swiss trains will finally be free for all citizens who will want to use them
Hand walking produces less CO2 than walking on feet according to a study from the University of la Chaux-de-fonds
Eating five carambars per day makes you look like a million bucks
Water and soil pollution could be a 21st century invention created with the sole purpose of generating fear
University students' complaints about tiredness seem to be just a pretext for studying less
The COP21, the international climate change conference, has come to the decision that all polluting industries are to be fined and the money thus collected will go to the poor
Eating five fruits and vegetables a day; an invention from farmers to sell more of their products
According to a recent studies by Pr. Jene Mangerien, the human body doesn't need nutriments to sustain itself anymore thanks to a new spontaneous mutation in our genetic code
As of this summer, the swiss governement has forbbiden the consumption of ice cream in order to prevent the melting of glaciers
As Einstein predicted, bees, aware of their importance, are on strike until they get better work conditions
